27namespace mpm_ebtools
28{
29 extern EBFArrayBoxFactory* ebfactory;
30 extern MultiFab *lsphi;
31 extern int ls_refinement;
32 extern bool using_levelset_geometry;
33 void init_eb(const Geometry &geom,const BoxArray &ba,
34 const DistributionMapping &dm);

37
38AMREX_GPU_DEVICE
39AMREX_FORCE_INLINE
40amrex::Real get_levelset_value(amrex::Array4<amrex::Real> phi,
41 const amrex::GpuArray<amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM> problo,
42 const amrex::GpuArray<amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM> dx,
43 amrex::Real ptxyz[AMREX_SPACEDIM],
44 amrex::Real lsref)
45{
46 //assuming a redistribute was done and no
47 //particle is outside of the tilebox
48 //
49 amrex::GpuArray<amrex::Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> ls_dx;
50 const int lo[AMREX_SPACEDIM]={0};
51 const int hi[AMREX_SPACEDIM]={0};
52 const GpuArray<int, AMREX_SPACEDIM> order_scheme_pseudo={1,1,1};
53 const GpuArray<int, AMREX_SPACEDIM> periodic_pseudo={1,1,1};
54
55 ls_dx[XDIR]=dx[XDIR]/lsref;
56 ls_dx[YDIR]=dx[YDIR]/lsref;
57 ls_dx[ZDIR]=dx[ZDIR]/lsref;
58
59 int i=amrex::Math::floor((ptxyz[XDIR]-problo[XDIR]+TINYVAL)/ls_dx[XDIR]);
60 int j=amrex::Math::floor((ptxyz[YDIR]-problo[YDIR]+TINYVAL)/ls_dx[YDIR]);
61 int k=amrex::Math::floor((ptxyz[ZDIR]-problo[ZDIR]+TINYVAL)/ls_dx[ZDIR]);
62
63 amrex::Real lsval=0.0;
64 for(int n=0;n<2;n++)
65 {
66 for(int m=0;m<2;m++)
67 {
68 for(int l=0;l<2;l++)
69 {
70 lsval += phi(i+l,j+m,k+n)*
71 basisval(l,m,n,i,j,k,ptxyz,problo,ls_dx,order_scheme_pseudo,periodic_pseudo,lo,hi);
72 }
73 }
74 }
75
76 return(lsval);
77}
78
79AMREX_GPU_DEVICE
80AMREX_FORCE_INLINE
81void get_levelset_grad(amrex::Array4<amrex::Real> phi,
82 const amrex::GpuArray<amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM> problo,
83 const amrex::GpuArray<amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM> dx,
84 amrex::Real ptxyz[AMREX_SPACEDIM],
85 amrex::Real lsref,amrex::Real lsgrad[AMREX_SPACEDIM])
86{
87 //assuming a redistribute was done and no
88 //particle is outside of the tilebox
89 //
90 amrex::GpuArray<amrex::Real,AMREX_SPACEDIM> ls_dx;
91 const int lo[AMREX_SPACEDIM]={0};
92 const int hi[AMREX_SPACEDIM]={0};
93
94 const GpuArray<int, AMREX_SPACEDIM> order_scheme_pseudo={1,1,1};
95 const GpuArray<int, AMREX_SPACEDIM> periodic_pseudo={1,1,1};
96
97
98 ls_dx[XDIR]=dx[XDIR]/lsref;
99 ls_dx[YDIR]=dx[YDIR]/lsref;
100 ls_dx[ZDIR]=dx[ZDIR]/lsref;
101
102 int i=amrex::Math::floor((ptxyz[XDIR]-problo[XDIR]+TINYVAL)/ls_dx[XDIR]);
103 int j=amrex::Math::floor((ptxyz[YDIR]-problo[YDIR]+TINYVAL)/ls_dx[YDIR]);
104 int k=amrex::Math::floor((ptxyz[ZDIR]-problo[ZDIR]+TINYVAL)/ls_dx[ZDIR]);
105
106 lsgrad[XDIR]=0.0;
107 lsgrad[YDIR]=0.0;
108 lsgrad[ZDIR]=0.0;
109 for(int n=0;n<2;n++)
110 {
111 for(int m=0;m<2;m++)
112 {
113 for(int l=0;l<2;l++)
114 {
115 lsgrad[XDIR] += phi(i+l,j+m,k+n)*
116 basisvalder(XDIR,l,m,n,i,j,k,ptxyz,problo,ls_dx,order_scheme_pseudo,periodic_pseudo,lo,hi);
117 lsgrad[YDIR] += phi(i+l,j+m,k+n)*
118 basisvalder(YDIR,l,m,n,i,j,k,ptxyz,problo,ls_dx,order_scheme_pseudo,periodic_pseudo,lo,hi);
119 lsgrad[ZDIR] += phi(i+l,j+m,k+n)*
120 basisvalder(ZDIR,l,m,n,i,j,k,ptxyz,problo,ls_dx,order_scheme_pseudo,periodic_pseudo,lo,hi);
121 }
122 }
123 }
124}
125#endif
